body:
```
iex "& { $(irm https://aka.ms/install-powershell.ps1) } -UseMSI"
VERBOSE: About to download package from
'https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v7.0.2/PowerShell-7.0.2-win-x86.msi'
^C
```

Expectation is it would install PowerShell-7.0.2-win-arm64.msix instead.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
Unfortunately the script does not support installing `msix` but only `MSI`. The script at https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/tools/install-powershell.ps1 needs to be updated for supporting installing via `msix` Thanks for reporting! We would appreciate if you could take a crack at it.
